Job Description About the role The Strategic Alliances group is responsible for developing and handling technical relationships with key software partners including Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Facebook and many open source organizations. The role of the group is to ensure that the Arm Partnership gets the very best in future software support, and to make sure we keep our Software Partners updated and motivated in supporting the latest Arm processors.  We are currently looking for a Technical Marketing Manager to help drive development of IoT, Machine Learning and payment software on Arm platforms. Externally to Arm this will involve working with some of the top software developers and companies to ensure future leading software performs optimally in concert with future Arm technologies.  You will be responsible for promoting Arm to key Software Partners through producing and delivering technical marketing collateral to these partners including but not limited to white papers, video tutorials, webinars, sample code and blogs. Internally this role will define and track key projects that our software engineering teams will work on to help these external partners.
